TradeRequest.questDescriptionRules.rules.li:
questDescription->A nearby settlement, [settlement_label], has a special trade request. They would like to purchase:

 [requestedThingCount]x [requestedThing_label] [qualityInfo](worth [requestedThingMarketValue_money])

If you want to make the trade, send a caravan with the requested items. The estimated travel time is [estimatedTravelTime_duration].

LanguageData.TradeRequest.LetterTextFavorReceiver.sla: Who should be credited with [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel] for fulfilling the trade request?
